structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

law.catch_line: Disposal and storage of pesticides -- Use not in accordance with label or of restricted use pesticides.

text.section: No person shall discard or store any pesticide or pesticide containers in a manner as to cause injury to humans, vegetation, crops, livestock, wildlife, or pollinating insects, or to pollute any waterway in a way harmful to any wildlife.
No person shall use any registered pesticide in a manner not in accordance with its label.
No person shall purchase, use, or supervise the use of, a restricted use pesticide unless the person is certified in a classification which permits the purchase, use, or supervision of use.
No person shall distribute a restricted use pesticide to a person who does not have the appropriate certification, registration, or license as prescribed in this chapter.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 19, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 18. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 19.
